system-characteristics.system-description: This system uses Microsoft Purview to manage and assess engagement metadata for compliance.

information-types.title: Engagement Metadata
information-types.description: Metadata describing client engagements, including status, sector, and channel.

components.title: Purview Metadata Checker
components.description: Python script that checks engagement status via Purview API.

statements.description: A Python script queries the Purview API using the entity GUID and checks that the 'status' field is set to 'closed'.

implemented-requirements.remarks: Control passed if the Purview entity's status is 'closed'.
